name: Ankle Sprain
description: A stretch or tear in the ligaments of the ankle.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, and elevation (RICE).

name: Runner's Knee
description: Pain around the kneecap from overuse.
solution: Rest, physical therapy, and proper footwear.

name: Tennis Elbow
description: Inflammation of the tendons in the elbow due to repetitive motion.
solution: Rest, ice, and physical therapy.

name: Shin Splints
description: Pain along the shin bone caused by stress on the shinbone and tissues.
solution: Rest, ice, and stretching exercises.

name: Hamstring Strain
description: Overstretching or tearing of the hamstring muscles.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, and gentle stretching.

name: Groin Pull
description: Strain or tear in the inner thigh muscles.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, and strengthening exercises.

name: Achilles Tendonitis
description: Inflammation of the tendon that connects the calf muscles to the heel bone.
solution: Rest, ice, stretching, and physical therapy.

name: Rotator Cuff Injury
description: Damage to the muscles or tendons around the shoulder joint.
solution: Rest, ice, physical therapy, and surgery if severe.

name: Plantar Fasciitis
description: Inflammation of the tissue along the bottom of the foot.
solution: Rest, ice, stretching, and orthotics.

name: Back Strain
description: Injury to muscles or tendons in the back.
solution: Rest, ice, gentle stretching, and pain relievers.

name: Shin Splints
description: Pain along the shinbone caused by overuse or repetitive stress.
solution: Rest, ice therapy, proper footwear, and stretching exercises.

name: Achilles Tendinitis
description: Inflammation of the Achilles tendon due to overuse.
solution: Rest, ice, heel lifts, and physical therapy.

name: Groin Pull
description: Tearing or overstretching of the groin muscles.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, gentle stretching, and strengthening exercises.

name: Dislocated Shoulder
description: Injury where the upper arm bone pops out of the shoulder socket.
solution: Medical reduction, immobilization, and physical therapy.

name: Bursitis
description: Inflammation of the bursae (small fluid-filled sacs) that cushion joints.
solution: Rest, ice, anti-inflammatory medications, and physical therapy.

name: Patellar Tendinitis
description: Inflammation of the tendon connecting the kneecap to the shinbone.
solution: Rest, ice, strengthening exercises, and physical therapy.

name: Tennis Elbow
description: Overuse injury causing pain in the elbow and forearm.
solution: Rest, ice, braces, and physical therapy.

name: Hamstring Strain
description: Injury to the muscles at the back of the thigh.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, and gradual stretching.

name: Labral Tear
description: Injury to the cartilage surrounding the hip or shoulder joint.
solution: Rest, anti-inflammatory medication, and possible surgery.

name: Meniscus Tear
description: Tear of the cartilage in the knee.
solution: Rest, ice, physical therapy, and possible surgery.

name: Stress Fracture
description: Small cracks in a bone caused by repetitive force.
solution: Rest, avoiding weight-bearing activities, and protective footwear.

name: Hip Flexor Strain
description: Injury to the muscles that help raise your knee.
solution: Rest, ice, stretching, and strengthening exercises.

name: IT Band Syndrome
description: Irritation of the iliotibial band, causing lateral knee pain.
solution: Rest, stretching, foam rolling, and physical therapy.

name: Ankle Sprain
description: Stretching or tearing of ligaments in the ankle.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, elevation (RICE method).

name: Costochondritis
description: Inflammation of the cartilage connecting a rib to the sternum.
solution: Rest, anti-inflammatory medications, and physical therapy.

name: Plantar Fasciitis
description: Inflammation of the plantar fascia tissue on the foot sole.
solution: Rest, ice, arch supports, and stretching exercises.

name: Quadriceps Strain
description: Injury to the front thigh muscles.
solution: Rest, ice, compression, and strengthening exercises.

name: Rotator Cuff Tear
description: Tearing of the muscles/tendons stabilizing the shoulder.
solution: Rest, physical therapy, and possible surgery.

name: Whiplash
description: Neck injury from sudden, forceful movement.
solution: Rest, neck exercises, pain relievers, and physical therapy.

name: Ulnar Nerve Entrapment
description: Compression of the ulnar nerve in the elbow or wrist.
solution: Rest, splinting, physical therapy, and possible surgery.
